summary: This document contains multiple Fedwire transaction records related to the JEPSTEIN VIRGIN ISLANDS FOUNDATION, detailing incoming and outgoing funds, including charitable contributions and payments for services. The records highlight various transactions, their amounts, and the banks involved, indicating financial activities associated with the foundation.

persons.name: Jepstein Virgin Islands Foundation
persons.context: The foundation is the primary entity receiving and sending funds in the documented transactions.

persons.context: This bank is involved in multiple transactions as the sending bank for funds to the foundation.

persons.name: Education Advance
persons.context: Education Advance is mentioned as the originator of a donation to the foundation.

persons.context: This entity is mentioned as a beneficiary for rent payments made by the foundation.

persons.name: Studio City Music, Inc.
persons.context: This company is noted as the originator of a payment to the foundation.

connections.description: Pershing LLC acts as the bank for the foundation, handling its transactions.

keyFacts: Multiple transactions involving the JEPSTEIN VIRGIN ISLANDS FOUNDATION were documented, indicating significant financial activity.
The foundation received large sums of money, including a $100,000 transaction on November 17, 2016.
Payments for rent were made to Peninsula Property Management, indicating operational expenses.
Education Advance made a donation to the foundation, which was later returned.
Studio City Music, Inc. and other entities are involved in financial transactions with the foundation.
